document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

bibRefCitation.author: Gyllenhal, L.
bibRefCitation.refString: Gyllenhal, L. (1835) [new taxa]. In: Schoenherr, C. J., Genera et species curculionidum, cum synonymia hujus familiae. Species novae aut hactenus minus cognitae, descriptionibus a Dom. Leonardo Gyilenhal, C. H. Boheman, el entomologis aliis illustratae. Tomus tertius. - Pars prima. [1836], Roret, Parisii and Fred. Fleischer, Lipsia, 505 pp. https: // doi. org / 10.5962 / bhl. title. 8952

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined.
174 specimens ( ZIN , SIZK , KUMN , ZMUK , NSPU , ZMUM , IMC ) from 17 provinces were studied.
Crimea
:
4 spec. ( SIZK ) Bilohirsk Distr. , Hrushivka env.,
11.vi.1957
;
1 spec. ( ZMUM ) Karadag , G. Kostylev leg.,
24.vii.1927
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Dzhankoy Distr. , Tselinne , Sivash coast, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
14.v.1983
;

Donetsk Prov.
: 3 spec. ( KUMN ) Lyman Distr. , Yatskivka , V . Martynov leg.,
28.vii.1998
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Volnovakha Distr. , Velykoanadolskyi Forest , Silantiev leg.
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Slovyanoserbsk Distr. , near Prishib , Arnoldi ,
vii.1936
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Svyatohirsk , Siverskyi Donets River , Arnoldi leg.,
11.vii.1936
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Sloviansk , salt marsh, Arnoldi , leg.,
vii.1936
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Krasnodon [= Sorokyne ] Distr. , Kruzhylivka , chalky slope
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Novgorodka env., gully,
on
Carduus pseudocollinus , S.V. Volovnik
leg.,
14.vii.1983
;
1 spec. ( KUMN ) Novoazovsk Distr. , Samsonove , Khomutovskyi Step Nature Reserve, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
2.viii.1982
;
6 spec. ( KUMN ) idem, in dry flower head of
Serratula radiata , S.V. Volovnik
leg.,
2.viii.1982
;
Kherson Prov.
: 1 spec. ( KUMN ) Hola Pristan Distr. , Solonoozernyi Division of Black Sea Biosphere Reserve, A. Drogvalenko leg.,
16.vii.1994
;
2 spec. ( ZIN ) Aleshki (= Tsiurupynsk ),
on
Centaurea pseudophrygia , D. Znoyko
leg.,
2.viii.1925
;
3 spec. ( SIZK ) Bilozerka Distr. , Yasna Polyana , V . S. Solodovnikova leg.
;
2 spec. ( IMC ) Chaplinka Distr. , Askania- Nova, I. V . Maltsev leg.,
17.v.1968
;
1 spec. ( IMC )
Kherson , Velyky Potemkinskyi Island, I. V . Maltsev leg.,
7.vii.1956
;
3 spec. ( SIZK ) Hola Pristan Distr. , Black Sea Biosphere Reserve , Ivano-Rybalchanskyi Division, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
12.viii.1983
; Kropyvnytskyi Prov. :
2 spec. ( SIZK ) Novgorodka env., gully, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
14.vii.1983
; Zakarpatska Prov. :
2 spec. ( ZMUK ) Svaliava Distr. , Polyana ,
28.vi.1956
;
1 spec. ( ZMUM ) Veliky Berezny , L. Zimina leg.,
7.vi.1964
;
1 spec. ( IMC ) Khust , I. V . Maltsev leg.,
7.viii.1966
;
2 spec. ( KUMN ) Vynohradiv Distr. , Tekove env., D. V . Vovk leg.,
6.vii.1995
;
Zaporizhia Prov.
: 1 spec. ( SIZK ) Rozyvka Distr. , Kamyani Mohyly Reserve ,
26.vi.1965
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) idem, S. V . Volovnik ,
14.vi.1983
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Kamyanka- Dniprovska ,
16.vi.1952
;
Zhytomyr Prov. :
9 spec. ( IMC ) Malin ,
on
Centaurea , A. Bohachyov
leg.,
7.vi.1944
;
1 spec. ( IMC ) Malin , A. Bohachyov leg.,
15.vii.1944
.

Biology. Primary steppes, ruderal habitats. Adults occur in V–IX. Oligophagous on
Centaurea
spp. and
